alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:27PM CDT until May 07 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROCK ISLAND...MERCER...NORTHWESTERN LOUISA... SOUTHEASTERN CEDAR...WESTERN SCOTT AND MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 627 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Stockton to Loud Thunder Scout Camp to near Eliza, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, Muscatine, Aledo, Durant, Eldridge, Milan, Wilton, Burgess, Walcott, Blue Grass, Buffalo, Andalusia, Viola, Long Grove, Millersburg, Matherville and Sherrard. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
